title: Destructive Silence: Based on a True Story
description: Destructive Silence is the first book of three based on the author's true story.If you never speak of the past, can it be erased?Lacey Edwards has a past.A past which changed her life forever.A past she is desperate to forget.Lacey is quiet and reserved compared to her best friend Becca Fox. They became instant friends when Lacey moved to Maryland nine years ago. Becca helped pull Lacey out of her internal shell to experience life. By high school, Lacey was active in the club scene and would occasionally have to drag Becca with her. One night, Lacey realized she might be able to run from her past with the help of Becca and one steamy Caine Rogers.Lacey didn't know, until it was too late, how feelings, honesty, heartbreak and life altering events can change a person. Lacey has Beccaâ€™s support but will that be enough?Will Lacey sacrifice her own happiness to do what is expected?***WARNING***Appropriate for readers 18 & up only!
author: L.U. Ann
